Title: Day 415
Writer: Phil Alden Robinson (created by), William M. Finkelstein, Michelle King (created by), Robert King (created by), Tegan Shohet (story editor)
Actors: Christine Baranski, Cush Jumbo, Rose Leslie, Sarah Steele
Plot: Tensions remain high when the firm learns another Chicago lawyer has been murdered by a client; Liz positions herself as a potential ally for Diane; Maia's trial takes an unwelcome turn.
